title: Mashle: Magic and Muscles (Specials)
description: Special 1: Episode 6.5 recaps the events of Episode 1-6. With Regro Burnedead and Brad Coleman reading a letter written by Mash Burnedead about his start to school life. One day, Regro received a letter from Mash which delighted him with details of Mashâ€™s recent experiences. However, the contents of the letter were not what Regro had expected from school life. They were full of danger, surprises, and much confusion.
